author: Durk
install_msg: Thank you for installing the SS14Currency cog! Use `[p]help SS14Currency` for commands.
name: SS14Currency
description: A cog to manage SS14 server currency for players, with admin commands to add, remove, and set coin amounts.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord user IDs and provided game account identifiers necessary for the currency management functionality, mapped per server.
